data.persona: I am a mourner at a freshly dug grave.  My mother was buried today.  She was very sick.  My father couldn't get her to the doctor in time.  My brothers and I are very sad.
data.description:
You are in the Cemetery.
Dim and low lit. The aura from this cemetery emits sadness and pain perpetually. You can feel and sense the eerie nature of the graveyard crawl up your spine. There seems to be a slight fog slowly making its way across the open parts of the cemetery.
There's a Corroded vessels placed, a A giant withered oak tree, an a slight fog, a gravestones, some at oblique angles, and a gravestone here.
The crow is here.

You are carrying a Rose, and wearing a clothes.

data.mid_motivation: I should write my father a letter of love.
data.long_motivation: I want to cheer up my brothers by taking them on a trip.
